author: trawick
msg: don't assume child process can both connect and close before parent can
both accept and look for EOF
(fixes intermittent failure seen on Linux and OpenSolaris)

author: dims
msg: skip tests if "-Dtest=false" is specified in the command line

author: jacopoc
msg: Hidden the "Description" label if the invoice description is empty; also fixed a NPE check.

author: jacopoc
msg: Removed tax id field from postal address; the same field is already printed under the customer id in the top part of the invoice.

author: jacopoc
msg: Fixed bug that was preventing the recursive algorithm to work properly.
